files.patch:
@@ -185,2 +185,8 @@
-	$(ECHO) "HELP: Run 'make doctor' to diagnose build problems."
-	$(ECHO) ""
+        ifeq ($(BUILD_ENV), ci)
+	  $(ECHO) ""
+	  $(ECHO) "=== Running 'make doctor' [ci build] ==="
+	  $(MAKE) $(MAKE_ARGS) -j 1 -f make/Main.gmk doctor
+        else
+	  $(ECHO) "HELP: Run 'make doctor' to diagnose build problems."
+	  $(ECHO) ""
+        endif
